dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.fallbackDays: {n} days without pipeline data, using estimation formula. Re-run Pipeline for accurate prices.
dashboard.adrDivergenceDetail: {n} days have ADR (ref) diverging > 30% from anchor price. Check approved prices or update Base Rate in Settings.
dashboard.calcAnchor: Anchor: approved price or rack rate (base √ó season)
dashboard.calcSuggested: Suggested: Anchor √ó OCC multiplier √ó DOW √ó lead-time factor
dashboard.reasonLowPickup: Low pickup, OTB {otb}, projected {proj} ‚Üí lower rate {delta}
dashboard.reasonMissingPrice: Missing current rate ‚Äî no adjustment suggested
dashboard.missingBookTime: Missing book_time data for lead-time analysis.
dashboard.noOtbData: No OTB data. Please upload reservations and build OTB.
dashboard.setupWarning: Hotels not configured! Go to Settings to enter room count and other info.

analytics.title: Analytics Insights
analytics.errorLoadingRetry: Error loading analytics data. Please try again later.
analytics.goToDataPage: Go to Data Management ‚Üí Build Features
analytics.poorCoverage: ‚ùå Insufficient data ‚Äî results may be inaccurate
analytics.runPipelineFirst: Run the pipeline first to generate analytics
analytics.missingBookTime: No booking time data available. Upload data with booking timestamps.
analytics.tipPaceTip: Compare rooms sold this year vs STLY (Same Time Last Year). E.g.: +50% means 1.5x rooms sold.
analytics.tipPaceGood: üü¢ Positive = selling better than last year. üî¥ Negative = selling less ‚Üí increase marketing.
analytics.tipPickupTip: Median rooms booked per day in last 7 days.
analytics.tipPickupGood: üü¢ Higher is better. 0 = not enough data.
analytics.tipSupplyGood: üü¢ Low = nearly full. üü° High = many empty rooms.
analytics.tipStlyTip: Percent of days with STLY comparison data.
analytics.tipT7Tip: Rooms booked in last 7 days for those stay dates.
analytics.tipT3Tip: Additional rooms booked in last 3 days.
analytics.tipOtbTip: Total rooms booked for that stay date.
analytics.tipOtbGood: Confirmed booked rooms. Closer to capacity = better.
analytics.tipStlyColTip: Same Time Last Year ‚Äî rooms sold for corresponding dates last year.
analytics.tipStlyColGood: Used for comparison: selling better or worse than last year?
analytics.tipPaceColTip: Percentage difference between this year and last year.
analytics.tipPaceColGood: üü¢ Positive = better. üî¥ Negative = worse ‚Üí take action.
analytics.tipRemGood: üü¢ Low = nearly full. üü° High = many available.

quickMode.noData: No pricing data yet. Run Pipeline first.
quickMode.detailedDesc: View OTB + forecast data to understand WHY
quickMode.guideQuickWhen: When? Every morning, open Dashboard ‚Üí Suggested Prices ‚Üí Approve
quickMode.guideQuickDecision: Decision: Approve each day or Approve all (Stop Sell cannot be approved)
quickMode.guideQuickSource: Source: price_recommendations table ‚Äî calculated by Pricing Engine
quickMode.guideDetailedWhen: When? Want to understand WHY the system suggests this price
quickMode.guideDetailedWhat: Shows? OTB, remaining, forecast, current vs suggested, % change
quickMode.guideDetailedDecision: Decision: Accept or reject suggestion for each day
quickMode.guideDetailedSource: Source: from OTB + Forecast + Pricing Engine ‚Äî consolidated data
quickMode.sourceOfTruth: Both modes read from Pricing Engine (run Pipeline). Quick mode shows processed results, Detailed shows raw data. Approvals save to pricing_decisions.

quickMode.paywallFeature1: Daily price suggestions based on OTB & Forecast
quickMode.paywallFeature3: Quick Approval mode ‚Äî decide pricing in 30 seconds
quickMode.paywallFeature4: Auto guardrails ‚Äî never price outside boundaries

settingsPage.settingsHint: Changes affect Dashboard. Capacity determines Occupancy & Remaining Supply.
settingsPage.demoDesc: Demo Hotel helps you explore the system. To use with real data, create your own hotel.
settingsPage.paymentHistoryDesc: All payment transactions for the hotel

roiCalc.title: Promotion Effectiveness
roiCalc.subtitle: Enter program costs (Genius, Preferred, AGP...) to see if the hotel profits or loses
roiCalc.programCostTooltip: E.g: Genius (10%), Preferred (15% + 3% = 18% -> enter the add-on or total discount)
roiCalc.breakevenDesc: You need to increase revenue by at least {pct}% to cover program costs.
roiCalc.recProfitMsg: The program generates an additional {amount} in net profit. Growth of {uplift}% exceeds breakeven {breakeven}%.
roiCalc.recLossMsg: Growth of {uplift}% is insufficient to cover program costs. Minimum {breakeven}% needed to break even.

reviewCalc.title: Review Score Calculator
reviewCalc.simDesc: **Impact Simulation**: See how new reviews affect the score (useful for proactively requesting good reviews).
reviewCalc.targetDesc: **Target Score**: Calculate how many good reviews are needed to reach the desired score (for improvement planning).
reviewCalc.disclaimer: Booking.com uses a **weighted** system (newer reviews count more). This formula uses simple average ‚Äî results are **estimates**, not 100% accurate.
reviewCalc.targetExplanation: To reach {target}/10 from {current}/10 (currently {count} reviews), you need {needed} new reviews with average score {score}/10.

guidePage.title: RMS User Guide
guidePage.subtitle: Guide for General Managers and revenue management staff
guidePage.tsBlankFix: Go to Upload, drag & drop XML/CSV file from PMS
guidePage.tsUploadFix: Use XML or CSV file exported from PMS (Opera, RoomRaccoon, Cloudbeds)
guidePage.tsPickupFix: Upload more, wait 7 days for pickup data
guidePage.tsForecastFix: Continue uploading daily, accurate forecast available after 2 weeks
guidePage.tsPriceFix: Reduce number of promotions or check commission boosters
guidePage.tsSeasonFix: Go to Config Season, check date ranges
guidePage.paywallSubtitle: Guide for OTB analysis, Pickup, Forecast and Revenue Management
guidePage.morningDesc: Follow these 6 steps every morning for effective revenue management:
guidePage.morningTip: Total time: ~5 minutes. After upload, the system processes data automatically.
guidePage.step1Desc: Use the Google account provided by admin. After signing in, you'll see your assigned hotel in the sidebar.
guidePage.step1Tip: If you don't have access, contact admin via Zalo: 0778602953
guidePage.step2Desc: Go to Upload menu ‚Üí Drag & drop XML or CSV file from PMS (Opera, RoomRaccoon, Cloudbeds...).
guidePage.step2Warn: Upload data daily (morning) for the most accurate metrics.
guidePage.step3Desc: Go to Data menu ‚Üí Click buttons in order:
guidePage.step4Kpi: KPI Cards: Rooms OTB, Remaining Supply, Pickup
guidePage.step4Price: Price Table: Recommended price for each day
guidePage.glossOtb: On The Books ‚Äî Rooms/revenue already booked
guidePage.glossAdr: Average Daily Rate ‚Äî Average room price
guidePage.glossPickup: New bookings within a time period
guidePage.glossBar: Best Available Rate ‚Äî Base price on OTA (before promos)
guidePage.glossNet: Actual revenue after commission and promotions
guidePage.glossDisplay: Price guests see on OTA (after promos)
guidePage.glossStly: Same Time Last Year ‚Äî Year-over-year comparison
guidePage.glossPace: Booking pace ‚Äî compared to same period
guidePage.glossRemaining: Number of available rooms for sale
guidePage.glossStacking: Combining multiple promos (additive / progressive / pick one)
guidePage.faqDqWarnings: Most warnings are PAST_STAY_DATE ‚Äî data has past stay dates.
guidePage.faqPickupDesc: Pickup = Compare today's bookings with 7 days ago. Need at least 2 uploads ‚â• 7 days apart.
guidePage.faqForecastDesc: Without enough pickup data, the system uses rough estimates. After ‚â• 2 uploads ‚â• 7 days apart, forecast will be based on actual pickup.
guidePage.faqUploadDesc: Check: (1) File is in XML/CSV format, (2) Run Build OTB ‚Üí Build Features ‚Üí Run Forecast, (3) Wait a few seconds for processing.
guidePage.rmDesc: Revenue Management (RM) = selling the right room, at the right price, at the right time to maximize revenue. The system helps you:
guidePage.rmMonitorDesc: How many rooms are booked, how many are available
guidePage.rmForecastDesc: Predict booking pace for the next 30‚Äì90 days
guidePage.rmPriceRecDesc: Accept system price or Override with your own
guidePage.kpiDesc: Dashboard shows 4 main KPI cards. Read them by common GM questions:
guidePage.kpiOtbDesc: Rooms already booked. E.g.: OTB = 45 means you've sold 45 rooms for that day.
guidePage.kpiRemDesc: Rooms still available. E.g.: Remaining = 15 means 15 rooms left to sell.
guidePage.kpiPickupDesc: New bookings in the last 7 days. Pickup = +8 is good (demand increasing).
guidePage.kpiAdrDesc: Average room price. E.g.: ADR = 1.2M means averaging 1.2M per room per night.
guidePage.chartsTitle: How does it compare to last year?
guidePage.chartsDesc: OTB chart helps you compare performance with Same Time Last Year (STLY):
guidePage.chartsCurrent: Current Year OTB ‚Äî Blue line: current bookings
guidePage.chartsStly: STLY ‚Äî Gray line: bookings same time last year
guidePage.chartsPace: Pace ‚Äî +5 OTB = selling 5 rooms ahead of last year
guidePage.chartsTip: If Pace is negative (‚àí), you're selling slower than last year ‚Üí consider lowering prices or increasing promotions.
guidePage.recTitle: How to Read the Price Recommendation Table
guidePage.recDesc: Dashboard has 2 view modes: Quick Review and Detailed Analysis.
guidePage.recQuickDesc: Quick view of recommended prices, actions (Increase/Decrease/Keep), and approve.
guidePage.recQuickFor: For: GM daily price review (5 minutes)
guidePage.recDetailDesc: View OTB, Remaining, Forecast, Anchor, ADR ‚Äî understand WHY the system recommends.
guidePage.dpDesc: Dynamic Pricing auto-adjusts prices based on 3 factors:
guidePage.dpFormula: Dynamic NET = Base NET (season) √ó Multiplier (OCC tier)
guidePage.seasonsDesc: Season determines the base NET price. 3 season types:
guidePage.seasonsPriorityWarn: Priority rule (auto-detect): If a day belongs to multiple seasons, the system picks the highest priority: Holiday (P3) > High (P2) > Normal (P1).
guidePage.occDesc: OCC Tier is a price tier based on occupancy. Each tier has a multiplier.
guidePage.occTip: OCC% is calculated automatically from OTB data: OCC = Rooms Booked / Total Hotel Rooms. If no data yet, you can enter manually.
guidePage.analCta: Ready to view your hotel data?
guidePage.pricingIntroDesc: The system calculates 3 price types from 1 single base price (NET):
guidePage.formulaTip: System calculates automatically. You only need to enter NET ‚Äî BAR and Display are calculated for you.
guidePage.channelsDesc: Each OTA calculates differently. Click each channel for details:
guidePage.agodaDesc: Agoda uses ADDITIVE stacking: promotions are added together.
guidePage.agodaWarn: Note: If stacking too many promotions, NET may drop below desired level!
guidePage.bookingDesc: Booking uses PROGRESSIVE stacking: promotions are applied progressively (promo 2 applies on price after promo 1).
guidePage.expediaDesc: Expedia uses HIGHEST_WINS: only the highest % promotion applies.
guidePage.travelokaDesc: Traveloka uses SINGLE (similar to HIGHEST_WINS): only 1 promotion at a time.
guidePage.ctripDesc: CTRIP uses ONLY_WITH_GENIUS: add-on promos only apply when main promo is active.
guidePage.promoProgressive: Progressive: promo 2 applies on price after promo 1
guidePage.promoSingle: Only 1 promo / add-on depends on main promo
guidePage.compareTip: Same NET price, each channel shows guests different prices due to different promo and commission calculations.
guidePage.matrixDesc: Price matrix shows prices for all room types √ó all OCC tiers at once.
guidePage.matrixBaseNet: NET price by season (before OCC multiplier)
guidePage.matrixOccCols: Price after OCC multiplier (depends on mode: NET/BAR/Display)
guidePage.matrixHighlight: Currently active tier based on actual OCC%
guidePage.matrixRedCell: Guardrail violation ‚Äî price too high or too low
guidePage.matrixBarDesc: Base price before promos, after commission
guidePage.reverseDesc: When you know the BAR price and want to know actual NET received:
guidePage.reverseTip: The "Reverse Calc" tab on the Pricing page lets you enter BAR to calculate NET for each OTA channel.
guidePage.exportDesc: Click Export to download the price table as a CSV file.
guidePage.exportItem3: NET, BAR, Display prices for each OCC tier
guidePage.exportTip: Open CSV file in Excel or Google Sheets ‚Üí Print for Front Desk team or send to Sales Manager to update OTA prices.
guidePage.pricingCta: Ready to calculate prices for OTA channels?
guidePage.importDesc: Upload data file from PMS (Property Management System) so the system has data to analyze.
guidePage.importStep1Desc: Export booking data from PMS (Opera, RoomRaccoon, Cloudbeds...) in XML or CSV format.
guidePage.importStep1Tip: File must contain: guest name, booking date, stay date, room type, rate.
guidePage.importStep2Desc: Drag & drop file into upload area or click to select file.
guidePage.importStep3Desc: System shows number of data rows processed and warnings (if any).
guidePage.importWarn: Upload daily (morning) for the most accurate data. System auto-skips duplicate rows.
guidePage.buildOtbDesc: This step aggregates booking data into OTB (On The Books) ‚Äî rooms booked per day.
guidePage.buildOtbOutput: Output: OTB table: rooms/revenue booked per stay_date
guidePage.buildFeatDesc: Calculate analytics metrics from OTB data:
guidePage.buildFeatPickup: Pickup: New rooms booked (compared to 7 days ago)
guidePage.buildFeatStly: STLY: Rooms booked same time last year
guidePage.buildFeatPace: Pace: Booking pace compared to last year
guidePage.buildFeatWarn: Need at least 2 uploads 7 days apart for actual Pickup. Before that, the system will show "N/A".
guidePage.forecastDesc: Forecast additional future bookings based on booking pace:
guidePage.forecastWithData: With enough pickup data: Accurate forecast based on actual trends
guidePage.forecastWithout: Without enough pickup data: Shows "Estimate" using rough approximation (less accurate)
guidePage.forecastTip: After completing all 4 steps, return to Dashboard to see latest KPIs and Price Recommendations.
guidePage.rmPriceDesc: Accept system price or Override with your own
guidePage.recAnchor: Anchor price ‚Äî price GM is currently selling at
guidePage.accOtbTitle: OTB% vs Projected% ‚Äî What's the difference?
guidePage.accOtbDesc: Current rooms booked / total rooms. This is actual data, not a prediction.
guidePage.accProjDesc: Projected OCC = (OTB ‚Äì expected cancellations + expected new bookings) / total rooms. This is a prediction (may be inaccurate).
guidePage.accOtbMeaning: Meaning: currently 60% rooms are booked, but projected final is only 42% (due to cancellations).
guidePage.accAnchorTitle: What is Anchor? Why not use ADR?
guidePage.accAnchorDesc: Anchor = price GM is currently selling at (intention signal):
guidePage.accAnchorP1: 1. Priority 1: Most recently approved/overridden price for that day (last accepted)
guidePage.accAnchorP2: 2. Priority 2: Rack rate = Base Rate √ó Season (if no decision made yet)
guidePage.accAdrExplain: ADR (Average Daily Rate) = actual average selling price. This is an outcome signal ‚Äî affected by room type mix, discounts, OTA channel. Don't use ADR as the pricing anchor as it creates a feedback loop (ADR high ‚Üí raise price ‚Üí ADR higher ‚Üí spiral).
guidePage.accAdrTip: ADR is shown below Anchor in small text for reference. If ADR deviates from Anchor > 30%, a yellow warning banner will appear.
guidePage.accEngineTitle: How does the system decide to increase/decrease price?
guidePage.accEngineDesc: Pricing Engine uses Anchor + Projected OCC (not ADR):
guidePage.accAdrBannerTitle: What does the 'Large ADR Deviation' yellow banner mean?
guidePage.accAdrBannerDesc: When many days have ADR deviating > 30% from Anchor, the system warns:
guidePage.accAdrBannerCause: Cause: May be due to too many OTA promotions, room type mix, or outdated Base Rate in Settings.
guidePage.accAdrBannerAction: Action: Check Settings ‚Üí Base Rate, or review approved pricing decisions.
guidePage.accOverrideTitle: When should GM Override the price?
guidePage.accOverrideDesc: The system auto-recommends prices, but GM can Override when:
guidePage.accOverride1: Special events that the system doesn't know about (VIP group, event)
guidePage.accOverride2: ADR > Anchor + 30% ‚Üí market is paying higher, consider raising Anchor
guidePage.accOverride3: ADR < Anchor ‚àí 30% ‚Üí may be giving too many discounts
guidePage.accOverride4: Competitor changed prices suddenly (no integrated rate shopper yet)
guidePage.accOverrideTip: Operational rule: GM reviews Anchor-based recommendation; ADR is only for confirming whether the market accepts that level (sanity check).
guidePage.seasonStep1Desc: The "Seasons" panel will appear on the left.
guidePage.seasonStep2Desc: Click + NORMAL, + HIGH, or + HOLIDAY to create a new season.
guidePage.seasonStep3Desc: Open season ‚Üí + Add date range ‚Üí select start and end dates.
guidePage.seasonStep4Desc: In each season, enter the desired NET price for each room type.
guidePage.seasonStep5Desc: Click Save to apply. The price table will update automatically.
guidePage.seasonPriority: Priority rule (auto-detect): If a day belongs to multiple seasons, the system picks the highest priority: Holiday (P3) > High (P2) > Normal (P1).
guidePage.termsOtb: On The Books ‚Äî Total rooms/revenue booked
guidePage.termsAdr: Average Daily Rate ‚Äî Average room price per night
guidePage.termsOcc: Occupancy ‚Äî Room fill rate (% rooms sold)
guidePage.termsPickup: New rooms booked since last capture
guidePage.termsStly: Same Time Last Year ‚Äî Year-over-year comparison
guidePage.termsPace: Difference between current OTB vs STLY (ahead or behind)
guidePage.termsLeadTime: Number of days between booking and stay date
guidePage.chAgodaDesc: Agoda uses ADDITIVE stacking: promotions are added together.
guidePage.chAgodaWarn: Note: If stacking too many promotions, NET may drop below desired level!
guidePage.chBookingDesc: Booking uses PROGRESSIVE stacking: promotions are applied progressively (promo 2 applies on price after promo 1).
guidePage.chExpediaDesc: Expedia uses HIGHEST_WINS: only the highest % promotion applies.
guidePage.chTravelokaDesc: Traveloka uses SINGLE (similar to HIGHEST_WINS): only 1 promotion at a time.
guidePage.chTravelokaPriority: Promotion priority order: Flash Sale ‚Üí PayLater ‚Üí Coupon.
guidePage.chCtripDesc: CTRIP uses ONLY_WITH_GENIUS: add-on promos only apply when main promo is active.
guidePage.matrixGuardrail: Guardrail violation ‚Äî price too high or too low
guidePage.importS1Desc: Export booking data from PMS (Opera, RoomRaccoon, Cloudbeds...) in XML or CSV format.
guidePage.importS1Tip: File must contain: guest name, booking date, stay date, room type, rate.
guidePage.importS2Desc: Drag & drop file into upload area or click to select file.
guidePage.importS3Desc: System shows number of data rows processed and warnings (if any).
guidePage.forecastEnough: With enough pickup data: Accurate forecast based on actual trends
guidePage.forecastNotEnough: Without enough pickup data: Shows "Estimate" using rough approximation (less accurate)

uploadPage.tabBookedDesc: Upload "Reservation Booked On Date" reports from PMS. Select multiple files (Ctrl+Click or drag & drop).
uploadPage.tabCancelledDesc: Upload "Reservation Cancelled" reports from PMS. Select multiple files.
uploadPage.demoDragSub: Contact admin to be assigned a hotel
uploadPage.dragTitle: Drag & drop CSV, XML, or Excel files here
uploadPage.dragSub: Supports selecting multiple files at once (max 31 files/batch)
uploadPage.sampleBooked: Sample has 7 columns: Code, Booking Date, Check-in, Check-out, Room, Revenue, Status
uploadPage.sampleCancel: Sample has 8 columns: includes Cancel Date column (required)
uploadPage.xmlDesc: Export from PMS in Crystal Reports XML format.
uploadPage.tip: Tip: Use Ctrl+A (select all) or Ctrl+Click to select multiple files at once. System will automatically import each file in order.
uploadPage.unsupported: Only CSV, XML, or Excel (.xlsx) files supported

teamPage.limitReachedError: Limit reached members for the current plan.

setupTab.otaChannelsDesc: Configure your distribution channels and commissions.
setupTab.demoWarning: Demo mode ‚Äî changes won't be saved.

overviewTab.demoExportPdf: This feature is not available for Demo Hotel
overviewTab.demoExportCsv: This feature is not available for Demo Hotel

dynamicTab.title: Dynamic Pricing Matrix
dynamicTab.subtitle: Prices adjust automatically based on occupancy tiers.

promotionsTab.title: Promotions & Discounts
promotionsTab.selectChannel: Select a channel to manage promotions
promotionsTab.noChannels: No OTA channels configured. Go to Setup tab first.
promotionsTab.noPromotions: No promotions in this group. Click to add.
promotionsTab.selectFromCatalog: Select a promotion from the available catalog
promotionsTab.noRoomTypesYet: No room types yet. Please add them in the "Room Types" tab.
promotionsTab.enterGuestPrice: Enter price guest sees on OTA:
promotionsTab.b2bExplanation: B2B bookings (EPS/TAAP) have additional commission, resulting in lower net revenue
promotionsTab.step1Desc: Room price the hotel wants to receive
promotionsTab.selectRoomForPricing: Select a room type to view detailed pricing
promotionsTab.noPromosYet: No promotions yet ‚Äî Click to add
promotionsTab.agodaStackingWarning: Agoda auto-enables additive for Basic promotions
promotionsTab.agodaStackingDesc: When creating Basic promotions on Agoda, the "Combine with other promotions" button is ON by default. This causes all Basic promotions to stack discounts additively. If not desired, disable this in Agoda's management page for each promotion.
promotionsTab.tripCampaignWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Campaign does not stack with other promotions
promotionsTab.tripCampaignDesc: When Campaign is active, the system will automatically exclude other promotions (Regular, Targeted, Package...). Only the Campaign with highest % is applied.

insightsEngine.dangerWhat: Only {occPct}% rooms booked{paceInfo}. Need ~{gap} more room nights to reach safe level
insightsEngine.dangerSoWhat: This date is behind the required pace ‚Äî rooms will remain empty without early demand stimulation
insightsEngine.dangerDoThis: Reduce prices 8‚Äì15% on main channels to attract more bookings
insightsEngine.dangerDoThisLow: Need more data for specific recommendations ‚Äî please upload more bookings
insightsEngine.dangerImpact: If filling 50% of vacant rooms ‚Üí additional ~{amount}
insightsEngine.hotSoWhat: Demand exceeds remaining supply ‚Äî this is a good opportunity to raise prices
insightsEngine.hotDoThis: Raise prices 10‚Äì20%, prioritize low-commission channels (website, direct booking)
insightsEngine.hotImpact: If raising prices {pct}% for remaining rooms ‚Üí additional ~{amount}
insightsEngine.revenueWhat: In the next 30 days, the hotel has {totalRemaining} room nights without bookings
insightsEngine.revenueSoWhatForecast: System has calculated demand forecast for all 30 days ‚Äî sufficient info for pricing
insightsEngine.revenueSoWhatNoForecast: {days} days without demand forecast ‚Äî more data needed
insightsEngine.revenueDoThisLow: Please upload more booking data for more detailed recommendations
insightsEngine.revenueDoThisNoForecast: Focus on {days} days without forecast ‚Äî boost sales via website and loyal customers
insightsEngine.revenueDoThisRec: Go to Recommended Prices tab, select dates where recommended price is 5%+ above current ‚Üí review and apply
insightsEngine.revenueImpactRecHigh: If applying recommended prices, additional revenue ~{amount} (+{pct}%)
insightsEngine.revenueImpactLow: Rough estimate ~{amount} ‚Äî need more data for accuracy
insightsEngine.revenueImpactAdr: If selling all vacant rooms at current average price ‚Üí additional ~{amount}
insightsEngine.paceAheadTitle: vs STLY: ahead by {delta} room nights
insightsEngine.paceBehindTitle: vs STLY: behind by {delta} room nights
insightsEngine.paceDoThisLow: Need more data for detailed recommendations ‚Äî please upload more bookings
insightsEngine.paceDoThisAheadRate: Maintain pricing strategy, suggest room upgrades to increase revenue
insightsEngine.paceDoThisAheadVolume: Bookings are strong, prices can increase ‚Äî consider adjusting rates
insightsEngine.paceDoThisBehindVolume: Need {delta} more room nights to match STLY ‚Äî increase advertising or reduce prices on weak channels
insightsEngine.paceDoThisBehindRate: Rates are lower than STLY ‚Äî limit deep discounts, review pricing strategy
insightsEngine.accelSoWhat: Higher-than-normal bookings ‚Äî possibly due to events, peak season, or last-minute demand
insightsEngine.decelSoWhat: Bookings declining vs last week ‚Äî needs close monitoring and contingency planning
insightsEngine.accelDoThisLow: Please upload more booking data for more specific recommendations
insightsEngine.accelDoThis: No promotions needed for the next 7 days ‚Äî organic demand is strong
insightsEngine.decelDoThis: Consider demand stimulation ‚Äî review prices for dates with few bookings
insightsEngine.accelImpact: If maintaining good prices, avoid losing ~{amount} revenue
insightsEngine.decelImpact: Need to recover ~{amount} revenue vs last week
insightsEngine.pricingHintNote: Note: recent price changes may affect booking volume
insightsEngine.cancelWhat: Last week: {gross} new bookings, {cancelled} cancelled ‚Üí net gain {net} room nights{topChannel}
insightsEngine.cancelSoWhatHigh: High cancellation rate ‚Äî losing significant revenue each week
insightsEngine.cancelSoWhatNormal: Cancellation rate is normal ‚Äî continue monitoring
insightsEngine.cancelDoThisLow: Need channel data for detailed cancellation analysis
insightsEngine.cancelDoThisHigh: Review cancellation policy ‚Äî consider requiring deposits or cancellation fees
insightsEngine.cancelDoThisNormal: No action needed ‚Äî continue weekly monitoring
insightsEngine.cancelImpact: Losing {count} room nights per week due to cancellations
insightsEngine.oversellWhat: With {pct}% cancel rate, can accept 5‚Äì8% more bookings for dates above 80% occupancy
insightsEngine.oversellSoWhat: Leverage cancellation trends to optimize revenue ‚Äî walk risk is very low
insightsEngine.oversellDoThis: Allow 5‚Äì8% overbooking on dates above 80% occupancy
insightsEngine.oversellImpact: Recover ~{rn} room nights/month = +{amount}. Walk risk cost: {walkCost}/guest
insightsEngine.segmentSoWhat: Paying high OTA commissions ‚Äî opportunity to shift guests to direct booking to reduce costs
insightsEngine.segmentDoThisLow: Need channel data for more accurate analysis
insightsEngine.segmentDoThis: Ensure best website prices + run promotions for direct bookers and loyal guests
insightsEngine.segmentImpactLow: Not enough channel data to estimate
insightsEngine.segmentImpact: If shifting 10% bookings from OTA to direct ‚Üí save ~{amount}/year in commissions

boost.title: When Should You Boost Ranking?
boost.subtitle: Effective ranking boost principles based on real scenarios
boost.lowOccRec: Enable Visibility Booster (Booking) or AGP (Agoda) for gap days.
boost.competitorRec: Consider Mobile Rate or Last-Minute Deal instead of direct price reduction.
boost.lowSeasonRec: Join Genius Program (Booking) to reach the "Genius travelers" segment with existing demand.
boost.newPropertyRec: Priority Preferred Partner (credibility badge) + reply to 100% reviews + push competitive pricing.
boost.highCancelRec: Add Non-Refundable rate plan 10‚Äì15% lower to protect Net Bookings.
boost.goodPerfTitle: Good Performance, Want to Push More
boost.goodPerfRec: Double-down: increase Visibility Booster commission or join more Agoda campaigns.
boost.decisionLogDesc: Record Boost decisions for tracking & learning
boost.noDecisions: No decisions recorded yet. Click "Record" to start.

booking.rankingNoteText: Booking.com search results are personalized based on each guest's history. There is no fixed ranking ‚Äî track outcome metrics (Search Views, CTR, Conversion, Net Bookings) instead of position.
booking.funnelDesc: Booking.com ranks based on 3 pillars: CTR, Gross Bookings, and Net Bookings. Each checklist item shows which part of the funnel it impacts.
booking.photoDesc: Booking.com prioritizes properties with many HD photos. Property Page Score "Photos" section directly affects CTR.
booking.photoHow: Extranet ‚Üí Property ‚Üí Photos ‚Üí Upload photos ‚â•2048px width. Cover all room types, facilities, lobby, view.
booking.photoBenchmark: Page Score 100% ‚Üí up to 18% more bookings
booking.descDesc: Detailed description helps guests understand better ‚Üí increases conversion. Include USP, location, prominent amenities.
booking.descHow: Extranet ‚Üí Property ‚Üí General Info ‚Üí Update description in English. Emphasize unique selling points.
booking.facilitiesDesc: Guests filter by facilities (WiFi, Pool, Parking...). Missing = lost visibility in search results.
booking.facilitiesHow: Extranet ‚Üí Property ‚Üí Facilities & Services ‚Üí Tick all available amenities. Especially: WiFi, Parking, Pool, Breakfast.
booking.rateParityDesc: Booking.com penalizes properties priced higher than other OTAs or direct websites. Rate parity affects ranking.
booking.rateParityHow: Compare prices on Booking vs Agoda vs website. Use RMS Rate Shopper to monitor. Ensure Booking price ‚â§ other channels.
booking.flexPolicyDesc: Booking.com confirmed: cancellation policy affects ranking. Free cancellation option significantly increases conversion.
booking.flexPolicyHow: Extranet ‚Üí Rates & Availability ‚Üí Rate Plans ‚Üí Add "Free Cancellation" rate plan (free cancel before X days).
booking.competitivePriceDesc: Pricing is the main conversion driver. Guests compare prices with similar properties in the area.
booking.competitivePriceHow: Use RMS Price Comparison to see area pricing. Adjust prices based on demand (RMS Dashboard recommendations).
booking.availWindowDesc: Booking.com prioritizes properties with long-term availability. Early bookers will see your property in results.
booking.availWindowHow: Extranet ‚Üí Rates & Availability ‚Üí Calendar ‚Üí Open availability at least 12 months ahead. Close dates only when truly full.
booking.lastMinuteDesc: Don't close all inventory 1‚Äì2 days out. Last-minute travelers are a segment with ready demand.
booking.lastMinuteHow: Keep at least 1‚Äì2 room types open for booking in the next 48h if rooms are available.
booking.reviewScoreDesc: Review score strongly drives both CTR and conversion. Booking.com uses a weighted scoring system ‚Äî newer reviews have more impact.
booking.reviewScoreHow: Extranet ‚Üí Guest Reviews ‚Üí Reply to 100% of reviews. Improve service based on feedback. Use RMS Review Calculator to simulate.
booking.replyReviewsDesc: Reply Score is a component of Property Page Score. Professional replies to negative reviews build credibility.
booking.replyReviewsHow: Extranet ‚Üí Guest Reviews ‚Üí Reply to ALL reviews within 24‚Äì48h. Negative reviews: thank + specific solution.
booking.geniusDesc: Genius helps your property appear for "Genius travelers" ‚Äî making up the majority of Booking.com bookings.
booking.geniusHow: Extranet ‚Üí Opportunities ‚Üí Genius ‚Üí Enroll. Level 1: Discount ‚â•10% for Genius members. Level 2‚Äì3: add perks (breakfast, upgrade).
booking.geniusBenchmark: ~70% search result views on average (Genius travelers)
booking.preferredDesc: Preferred Partner gets a thumbs-up badge and ranking priority. Requirements: good performance + additional commission.
booking.preferredHow: Extranet ‚Üí Opportunities ‚Üí Preferred Partner Programme ‚Üí Enroll if eligible (review score, conversion rate...).
booking.preferredBenchmark: ~65% search views, ~20% more bookings on average
booking.vbDesc: Visibility Booster temporarily increases commission for higher ranking. Shown as "Ad" (paid advertising).
booking.vbHow: Extranet ‚Üí Opportunities ‚Üí Visibility Booster ‚Üí Enable for days needing push (low season, gap dates). Set commission boost %.
booking.mobileRateDesc: Special discount for guests booking via Booking.com app. Mobile bookings make up the majority of traffic.
booking.mobileRateHow: Extranet ‚Üí Rates & Availability ‚Üí Mobile Rates ‚Üí Enable ‚â•10% discount for mobile users.
booking.adNoteText: Some Booking.com search results are labeled "Ad" ‚Äî these are paid advertising (Visibility Booster). If a competitor stands out unusually, they may be using paid placement.
booking.adNoteSource: Source: Booking.com "How we work" ‚Äî Paid placements are labeled.
booking.disclaimerPersonalization: Booking.com search results are personalized based on user history. Rankings vary for each guest.
booking.disclaimerBenchmark: This is an estimated benchmark from Booking.com Partner Hub ‚Äî not guaranteed for individual hotels.
booking.disclaimerApiPending: Booking.com has paused new integrations. API features will be available when access is granted.

agoda.contentScoreNote: Data from Agoda Partner Hub (BA-verified). Original page returns 403.
agoda.propPhotosDesc: Property Photos = 45% of Content Score. Upload HD photos for lobby, facilities, exterior, pool, restaurant.
agoda.propPhotosHow: YCS ‚Üí Property ‚Üí Photos ‚Üí Upload ‚â•20 property photos (not rooms). Ensure coverage: lobby, pool, restaurant, exterior, amenities.
agoda.roomPhotosTitle: Room photos for each room type (25% weight)
agoda.roomPhotosDesc: Room Photos = 25% of Content Score. Each room type needs ‚â•5 unique photos (bed, bathroom, view, amenities).
agoda.roomPhotosHow: YCS ‚Üí Rooms ‚Üí Each room type ‚Üí Photos ‚Üí Upload ‚â•5 photos/room type. Wide angle shots, natural light.
agoda.descTransDesc: Description = 20% of Content Score. Detailed description in English ‚Äî Agoda auto-translates to other languages.
agoda.descTransHow: YCS ‚Üí Property ‚Üí Description ‚Üí Write description ‚â•200 words in English. Emphasize USP, location, unique experiences.
agoda.amenitiesDesc: Facilities/Amenities = 10% of Content Score. Tick all available amenities in your property.
agoda.amenitiesHow: YCS ‚Üí Property ‚Üí Facilities ‚Üí Tick all. Especially: WiFi, Parking, Pool, Gym, Spa, Airport Transfer.
agoda.reviewScoreDesc: Agoda review score = arithmetic mean √ó 2 (scale of 10). Each review has equal weight (unlike Booking.com).
agoda.reviewScoreHow: YCS ‚Üí Reviews ‚Üí Reply to all reviews. Focus on improving: Cleanliness, Location, Staff, Value for Money.
agoda.replyRateDesc: Review reply rate affects ranking. Reply quickly (24‚Äì48h) and professionally.
agoda.replyRateHow: YCS ‚Üí Reviews ‚Üí Reply ALL. Negative: thank + apologize + specific action plan. Positive: thank + invite to return.
agoda.rateCompDesc: Agoda compares prices with other OTAs. Rate parity violation = ranking gets penalized.
agoda.rateCompHow: YCS ‚Üí Rate Intelligence ‚Üí Check daily. Ensure Agoda price ‚â§ other channels. Use RMS Price Comparison.
agoda.availDesc: Long availability window + all room types = shown in more search results.
agoda.availHow: YCS ‚Üí Rates & Availability ‚Üí Calendar ‚Üí Open at least 12 months. Ensure all room types have active rate plans.
agoda.agpDesc: AGP increase commission for higher visibility. ROI = revenue from departed bookings / program cost.
agoda.agpHow: YCS ‚Üí Programs ‚Üí AGP ‚Üí Enroll. Set commission boost level. Monitor ROI via YCS dashboard or RMS ROI Engine.
agoda.agpBenchmark: ROI calculated on departed bookings / departed room nights
agoda.sponsoredDesc: Paid advertising on Agoda search results. Pay-per-click model.
agoda.sponsoredHow: YCS ‚Üí Programs ‚Üí Sponsored Listing ‚Üí Set daily budget + bid. Start small, monitor ROI.
agoda.disclaimerPartnerHub: Data from Agoda Partner Hub (YCS). Original page returns 403 ‚Äî information provided by BA and cross-checked with public content.
agoda.disclaimerBenchmark: These are average benchmarks ‚Äî estimates, not guaranteed results for individual hotels.
agoda.disclaimerAgpCommitment: AGP requires minimum 90-day participation (mandatory). Consider carefully before enrolling.
